org.apache.cocoon.components.sax
Class AbstractXMLByteStreamCompiler

java.lang.Object
  org.apache.cocoon.components.sax.AbstractXMLByteStreamCompiler
All Implemented Interfaces:
ContentHandler, LexicalHandler, XMLByteStreamConstants, XMLConsumer, org.apache.cocoon.xml.XMLConsumer
Direct Known Subclasses:
XMLByteStreamCompiler, XMLOutputStreamCompiler
public abstract class AbstractXMLByteStreamCompiler
extends Object
implements org.apache.cocoon.xml.XMLConsumer, XMLByteStreamConstants

This a simple xml compiler which outputs a byte array. If you want to reuse this instance, make sure to call recycle() inbetween two compilation tasks.

Version:
$Id: AbstractXMLByteStreamCompiler.java 628434 2008-02-17 06:48:17Z antonio $
